name: Marilith
description: A large fiend with the upper body of a humanoid woman and the lower body of a massive serpent, equipped with six swords.
memorable: Known for their strategic minds and ability to fight multiple opponents at once, combining martial prowess and demonic magic.
goals: Often serve as generals in the demonic armies of the Abyss, commanding troops and controlling battle scenarios.
relations: May serve alongside other demons and fiends as part of a demonic army.
environment: Typically found in the chaotic realms of the Abyss, where they lead armies and wreak havoc.
strengths: Possesses a high degree of agility and resilience, along with formidable swordsmanship and spell resistance.
weaknesses: Dependent on melee combat, susceptible to tactical disadvantages against ranged attackers.
attacks: Makes six attacks with longswords, dealing significant slashing damage, along with a powerful tail attack that can grapple opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Flaming Weapons, allowing each weapon attack to deal additional fire damage.
senses: Truesight up to 120 feet allows the Marilith to see through illusions and magical disguises.
skills: Possesses high proficiency in resisting spells thanks to its Magic Resistance.
additional_information: Can teleport short distances, enhancing its mobility in combat.
Can issue tactical commands to allies, improving their combat effectiveness.
Radiates a Chaotic Evil aura, representing its nature.
Grapples and restrains targets with its tail attack.
Advantages on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
test_queries: fiend with truesight and fire damage
